```{r setup, include=FALSE}
library(pwt10)
library(tidyverse)
library(knitr)
library(kableExtra)
library(TTR)
library(dineq)
library(gglorenz)
data("pwt10.0")
```

## Ejercicio 1
```{r include=FALSE}
df <- pwt10.0 %>% filter(year == 2017) %>% select(country, year, rgdpo, emp, hc) %>% group_by(country) %>% 
  mutate(prod.trab = rgdpo/emp)

df <- df %>% mutate(log(prod.trab),
                    log(hc))
```
```{r echo=FALSE, message=FALSE}
ggplot(df, aes(log(prod.trab), log(hc))) + geom_point()+
  theme_bw()
```


## Ejercicio 3
```{r include=FALSE}
df <- pwt10.0 %>% filter(year %in% 2000:2017) %>% select(isocode, year, rgdpo, emp, csh_i, pop, hc) %>% group_by(isocode) %>% mutate(prod.trab = rgdpo/emp,
           tasa.pob = ROC(pop, n=1))


df1 <- df %>% group_by(isocode) %>% 
  summarise(media.pob = mean(tasa.pob, na.rm = T),
            inversion.media = mean(csh_i)/0.24121228)

df.hc <- df %>% select(isocode, year, hc) %>% filter(year == 2017)

df.plot <- left_join(df1, df.hc)

df.plot <- df.plot %>% mutate(y.estimado= (inversion.media/((0.05+0.02+media.pob)/(0.05+0.02+8.423796e-03)))^((1/3)/(1-(1/3)))*hc)

```
```{r echo=FALSE, message=FALSE}
ggplot(ej1, aes(media.inv, prod.trab)) + geom_point()

ggplot(ej1, aes(media.pob, prod.trab)) + geom_point()

```
